001.name: Rega
001.text: Let's check your inventory then. Press 'I' to open inventory.

002.name: Rega
002.text: As you can see you have few slot inside inventory, please use it wisely!

003.name: Rega
003.text: To use item in inventory, you need to click it first and then press 'F' to use it.

004.name: Rega
004.text: In this case, please use the mask and close the inventory by click 'I' before we continue.
